features.featureTitle: In the BookAppointmentDialog component, style the submit 'Book Appointment' / 'Book Now' button with a bright teal or royal-blue background color (e.g., the site's teal accent — #0D9488 or equivalent OKLCH token) so it stands out prominently against the white form background. The button must have white text, a smooth hover state (slightly darker shade or glow), and a CSS transition of ~200–300ms. All other form elements remain white/light as-is.
